title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 41.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 41.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to State grants paid for school health projects funded under chapter 50 of the Laws of 1981 or any subsequent State law providing funding through the State Department of Health for similar school health projects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
41.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
